page.title: 05Interchange of People/News
page.content: Post office,5 Post boxes. Private telephones connected to Bidefofd exchange 3 public telephone boxes. Citizen Band Radio. The N.devon Journal herald published in Barnstaple. 2 free papers, Bideford Gazette, and N.Devon Advertiser BBC TV ITV TSW and Ch 4. BBC national and local radio Devon County Radio. Writers Circle. Tide times board. Local information and map board. Burrows information Centre with Warden accompanies parties on guided nature walks etc. No railway. Nearest railway station in Barnstaple 12 miles away. An hourly bus service during the day to Bideford Long distant coaches daily run to Bristol, Exeter and London. A Rapide coach which leaves daily. High proportion of cars to population due to difficult Public Transport.
